Package blackjack

Class Simulation

java.lang.Object
blackjack.Simulation
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameMode
public class Simulation
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameMode
Class that gets the commands when in Simulation mode

Implements the GameMode Interface

The betting commands are obtained from a betting strategy, while the player commands are obtained from a player strategy.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    (package private) BettingStrategy bet_strat
    Strategy used to get the betting commands
    private int currSNumber
    Number of shuffles already performed
    (package private) PlayerStrategy play_strat
    Strategy used to get the player commands
    private int sNumber
    Number of shuffles until the simulation ends (return "q" command)

  • Constructor Details

    • Simulation

      public Simulation​(int sNumber_in, PlayerStrategy play_s, BettingStrategy bet_s)
      Initializes the parameters for the simulation
      Parameters:
      sNumber_in - Stores the number of shuffles until the end of the simulation.
      play_s - Stores the selection of the playing strategy
      bet_s - Stores the selection of the betting strategy

  • Method Details

    • getPlayCommand

      public java.lang.String getPlayCommand​(int nHands, PlayerHand p_hand, Hand d_hand, int bet)
      Gets the Player command as advised by the chosen Playing Strategy
      Specified by:
      getPlayCommand in interface GameMode
      Parameters:
      nHands - Player's number of hands (used by the playing Strategy to check is the player can split)
      p_hand - Player's hand
      d_hand - Dealer's hand
      bet - Value of the bet
      Returns:
      best command according to the playing strategy or "q" if the simulation has ended

    • getBetCommand

      public java.lang.String getBetCommand()
      Gets the Betting command as advised by the chosen Betting Strategy
      Specified by:
      getBetCommand in interface GameMode
      Returns:
      best bet according to the betting strategy or "q" if the simulation has ended

      Increments the current sNumber
